snippet: Louise Erdrich won the fiction award for her novel “The Round House,” while other awards were given for nonfiction, poetry, young people’s literature and American letters.
abstract: Louise Erdrich wins National Book Award for fiction for The Round House, novel about a teenage boy's efforts to investigate attack on his mother on North Dakota reservation; other awards given for nonfiction, poetry, young people’s literature and American letters noted.
lead_paragraph: Louise Erdrich won the fiction award for her novel “The Round House,” while other awards were given for nonfiction, poetry, young people’s literature and American letters.

headline.seo: Louise Erdrich’s Novel ‘The Round House’ Wins National Book Award
headline.main: Novel About Racial Injustice Wins National Book Award
headline.print_headline: Novel About Racial Injustice Wins National Book Award
